metadata.title: CVE-2024-31755 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
cJSON v1.7.17 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation, which cantrigger through the second parameter of function cJSON_SetValuestring atcJSON.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-31755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcjson1 - 1.7.16-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cjson package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.16-1ubuntu0.2').
